00129                                            {
00130                 DWORD addr = (DWORD)_addr;
00131                 memmap::iterator i = AllocMap.find(addr);
00132                 if(i == AllocMap.end()) {
00133 #ifdef MEMORY_LOGGING
00134                         Debug::Log("Deallocated a dud block @ 0x%X!\n", addr);
00135 #endif
00136                         return 0;

00138                         size_t amount = AllocMap[addr];

00140                         AllocMap.erase(addr);
00141                         return amount;
